papadi ha awidime tharaga sandaha palathakin kridakayan 10k ha kridikawan 10k sahabhagi wethi.papadi tharagaya mul warata resin papadi bhawitha karamin pawathwimata krida amathyanshaya thiranaya kara atha.me isawwalata samagamiwa balaka balika marga dhawana tharagayak monaragala disthrikkaye awurudu 15 - 20 athara kridaka kridikawan wenuwen pawathwe.marathan, papadi ha awidime tharaga jayagrahakayanta mudalin thagi pirinamena athara palamu sthanayata rupiyal 25,000k dewani sthanayata 20,000k ha thewani sthanayata rupiyal 15,000k siwuwani sthanayata rupiyal 10,000k piriname.paswani sthanaye sita 7 wani sthanaya dakwa rupiyal 5000 baginda 10 wani sthanaya dakwa rupiyal 3000 bagin da piriname.
